events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate including their resume and cover letter.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department focusing on backend development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and next steps.
Initial phone screening was conducted, and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving skills.
The candidate responded promptly to scheduling the technical interview, expressing enthusiasm for the opportunity.
Technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for the candidate on May 7th at 2 PM UTC.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating proficiency in coding and system design.
Following the successful technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture and benefits.
HR interview was completed, and the candidate showed alignment with our organizational values and team environment.
An official offer for the Software Engineer role was proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about the benefits package.
The candidate accepted the offer formally and is excited to join the engineering team starting from the agreed date.
Onboarding process has started with the candidate completing all initial paperwork and setup for their new role.
The hiring process was successfully closed as the candidate has fully joined and integrated within the engineering team.
